alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Oakland; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:23PM EDT until August 03 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lapeer County in southeastern Michigan... Oakland County in southeastern Michigan... Southeastern Shiawassee County in southeastern Michigan... Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... Southern Genesee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Flint to near Linden to near Fowlerville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Linden around 425 PM EDT. Fenton, Grand Blanc and Lake Fenton around 430 PM EDT. Goodrich and Oak Grove around 435 PM EDT. Howell and Holly around 440 PM EDT. Ortonville around 445 PM EDT. Hartland around 450 PM EDT. Brighton and Clarkston around 455 PM EDT. Oxford around 500 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Rankin, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Conway Township and Lathrup Village. People attending Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
